page.title: 15MADELEY STAFFS : ANXIETIES
page.content: In addition to worries about the lack of employment & the imminent closure of 1 of the only 2 factories,there is worry about the changes at the Manor House.The owner applied for permission to open a hotel there.This was refused. He now wants to use it to give holidays to disturbed children.Local residents have protested.Others have welcomed the possibilities of jobs there. The College of Education closed in 1984 with loss of teaching & service jobs for residents & income from student lodgings.The building stands empty now. 1 consequence is the closure of the only bank,causing problems for business men & loss of customers to the town. The larger of the 2 post offices closed in 1984.The 1 left is too small.In bad weather pensioners queue outside.It has no parking space,so obstructions occur. Public meetings make no difference
